logicArchitect() - Method in class citadelles.bots.Bot
The logic for the action of the Architect NB: overridden by the current bot
logicArchitect() - Method in class citadelles.bots.MediumBot
Logic of the bot if he is the Architect He tries to place the first two card he can place
logicArchitect() - Method in class citadelles.bots.SmartBot
Logic of the bot if he is the Architect He tries to place a special district or his best card but check before himself if he has enough golds
logicArchitect() - Method in class citadelles.bots.StupidBot
Logic of the bot if he is the Architect If he can, he places his lowest card

Logic of the bot if he is the Assassin Murders a random character other than himself

Logic of the bot if he is the Assassin Murders a random character other than himself
logicFactory() - Method in class citadelles.bots.Bot
The logic for the action of the Factory district NB: overridden by the current bot
logicFactory() - Method in class citadelles.bots.MediumBot
Logic if the bot has the Factory district If he has more than 7 gold, he decides to exchange 3 golds for 3 cards
logicFactory() - Method in class citadelles.bots.SmartBot
Logic if the bot has the Factory district If he has more than 7 gold and less than 3 cards in his hand, then he decides to exchange 3 golds for 3 cards
logicFactory() - Method in class citadelles.bots.StupidBot
Logic if the bot has the Factory district He always tries to exchange 3 golds for 3 cards
logicGetGoldPerDistrict() - Method in class citadelles.bots.Bot
The logic for choosing if the bot want to get the gold from his district if he is the King, the Bishop, the Merchant or the Warlod NB: always True in fact
logicGraveyard(District) - Method in class citadelles.bots.Bot
The logic for the action of the Graveyard district NB: overridden by the current bot
logicGraveyard(District) - Method in class citadelles.bots.MediumBot
Logic if the bot has the Graveyard district If the destroyed district has already been built by the bot, then he does not buy it.
logicGraveyard(District) - Method in class citadelles.bots.SmartBot
Logic if the bot has the Graveyard district If the destroyed district has already been placed by the player then he does not buy it.
logicGraveyard(District) - Method in class citadelles.bots.StupidBot
Logic if the bot has the Graveyard district He is still trying to buy back the destroyed area without thinking
logicLaboratory() - Method in class citadelles.bots.Bot
The logic for the action of the Laboratory district NB: overridden by the current bot
logicLaboratory() - Method in class citadelles.bots.MediumBot
Logic if the bot has the Laboratory district If he has more than one card, he chooses to exchange a card with a value lower than 3 (if he has one) for a gold
logicLaboratory() - Method in class citadelles.bots.SmartBot
Logic if the bot has the Laboratory district If he has more than one card and less than 3 gold, he chooses to exchange a card with a value lower than 3 (if he has one) for a gold
logicLaboratory() - Method in class citadelles.bots.StupidBot
Logic if the bot has the Laboratory district If he has more than one card, he always chooses to exchange his first card for a gold
logicMagician() - Method in class citadelles.bots.Bot
The logic for the action of the Magician NB: overridden by the current bot
logicMagician() - Method in class citadelles.bots.MediumBot
Logic of the bot if he is the Magician Swap cards with the person who has the most cards.
logicMagician() - Method in class citadelles.bots.SmartBot
Logic of the bot if he is the Magician If he has less than 3 card in hand, Swap cards with the person who has the most cards.
logicMagician() - Method in class citadelles.bots.StupidBot
Logic of the bot if he is the Magician He exchanges cards with someone other than himself

logicWarlord() - Method in class citadelles.bots.MediumBot
Logic of the bot if he is the Warlord Destroys a district of the player who has the most buildings placed
logicWarlord() - Method in class citadelles.bots.SmartBot
Logic of the bot if he is the Warlord Destruct the max value district in the city of the more advanced player
logicWarlord() - Method in class citadelles.bots.StupidBot
Logic of the bot if he is the Warlord Destruct his first district.
